lead_paragraph: Sunderland Chief Executive Margaret Byrne has resigned over her role in the decision to allow Adam Johnson to continue playing for the team despite confessing to kissing a 15-year-old schoolgirl, the English Premier League club said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Sunderland Chief Executive Byrne Resigns Over Johnson
headline.main: Sunderland Chief Executive Byrne Resigns Over Johnson

snippet: Sunderland Chief Executive Margaret Byrne has resigned over her role in the decision to allow Adam Johnson to continue playing for the team despite confessing to kissing a 15-year-old schoolgirl, the English Premier League club said on Tuesday....
